ygData.subject: computer questions
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, I m one of those that can turn it on & run it, but don t know a thing about what s inside. I THINK mine has an AMD whatever chip -- 550 thingies if I
ygData.messageBody:
OK, I'm one of those that can turn it on & run it, but don't know a
thing about what's inside. I THINK mine has an AMD whatever chip --
550 thingies if I remember correctly. I know the 3D whats-it is one
that's either not actually listed for EQ, or is buried deep in the
compatability list on the main site -- not one listed right on the
Kunark box, at any rate. Same for the sound card. I also have 64 RAM,
& a 56k modem. I have no norrathly idea how far I am from my isp, or
even how to find that out. Oh, the comp itself is a Compaq Presario
something-or-other.

SOOooo... what piece of this should I look to upgrade 1st in order
to get better run of EQ? I think most of you know I am the slowest
zoner in the guild, & lately I've been having worse problems with lag
& ld than usual (which may be isp-load related & not something I can
upgrade, but I don't know). This is death for a bard, & making it
really tough to twist songs. I just bought the comp 2 months ago, but
could upgrade some piece, I think. Can't switch isp, since I got a
discount for signing up with them for 3 years.

Thanks for any helpful advice!

Todd (aka Snapdragyn & Gaistyd)
